title: Create professional About Us page for Evergreen Hub

requirements.text: Create a new AboutUs page component at frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx with professional, trust-building content describing Evergreen Hub as a digital learning and earning platform. The page must include six distinct sections: Introduction (Who we are), Our Mission, What We Offer (as bullet points), Why Choose Evergreen Hub, Our Vision for the Future, and Commitment to Transparency & Support. Content should be 500-700 words total, written in professional yet motivational tone with clear and simple language. Avoid fake income promises or exaggerated claims like 'guaranteed income'. Emphasize honesty and transparency throughout.

quotes: Write a professional, trust-building and SEO-friendly "About Us" page for a digital platform named "Evergreen Hub"
Structure Required: 1. Introduction (Who we are) 2. Our Mission 3. What We Offer (Bullet points) 4. Why Choose Evergreen Hub 5. Our Vision for the Future 6. Commitment to Transparency & Support

acceptanceCriteria: Page contains exactly six sections in the specified order
Introduction section clearly describes Evergreen Hub as a digital learning and earning platform
Our Mission section articulates the platform's purpose and goals

What We Offer section lists services as bullet points: skill-based online courses, affiliate marketing opportunities, ready-made landing pages, training sessions and webinars, performance tracking dashboard, community and team support system
Why Choose Evergreen Hub section highlights unique value propositions
Our Vision for the Future section describes long-term aspirations
Commitment to Transparency & Support section emphasizes honest practices and user support
Total word count is between 500-700 words
Language is professional yet motivational without exaggerated income claims
Content emphasizes honesty and transparency

requirements.text: Style the AboutUs page component with responsive mobile-first layout using the existing green and black theme with emerald accents. Apply Tailwind CSS classes consistent with the site's existing design system. Use clean typography with the Inter font family. Each section should have appropriate spacing, headings styled with emerald green accents, and content formatted for readability. Ensure the page is fully responsive across mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports.

quotes: Make it modern, inspiring and suitable for a startup digital brand website
Tone & Style: Professional yet motivational, Clear and simple language

acceptanceCriteria: Page uses existing green and black theme with emerald accents
Typography uses Inter font family consistently
Headings are styled with emerald green color (#10b981 or similar)
Sections have appropriate padding and margin spacing
Bullet points in 'What We Offer' section are properly formatted
Layout is responsive and adapts to mobile (< 768px), tablet (768px-1024px), and desktop (> 1024px) viewports
Design feels modern and inspiring, suitable for a startup brand

requirements.text: Integrate the AboutUs page component with the existing ThemeContext so all colors, backgrounds, and text adapt correctly to the user's selected theme (light/dark/system). Ensure visual consistency with the rest of the application when theme changes.
acceptanceCriteria: About Us page respects current theme setting from ThemeContext
Colors adapt correctly in light mode (white background, dark text)
Colors adapt correctly in dark mode (dark background, white text)
Emerald green accents remain visible and appropriately styled in both themes
Theme transitions are smooth when user switches themes

requirements.text: Add a new route at /about-us in the main App.tsx routing configuration that renders the AboutUs page component. Ensure the route is accessible to all users (no authentication required). Update the route definition to match the existing routing patterns in the application.
acceptanceCriteria: Route /about-us is defined in App.tsx routing configuration
Route renders the AboutUs page component
Route is publicly accessible without authentication
Route follows existing routing patterns and conventions

requirements.text: Update the MobileSidebar component navigation menu to change the 'About Us' link target from '/#about' to '/about-us' route, ensuring it navigates to the new dedicated About Us page instead of a section anchor.
acceptanceCriteria: About Us link in MobileSidebar navigates to /about-us route
Link is functional and properly closes the mobile sidebar on click
Navigation works correctly on mobile and tablet viewports

requirements.text: Update the Footer component Quick Links section to change the 'About Us' link from '/#about' to '/about-us' route, ensuring it navigates to the new dedicated About Us page.
acceptanceCriteria: About Us link in Footer Quick Links section navigates to /about-us route
Link styling is consistent with other footer links
Link is functional across all viewports

requirements.text: Add scroll-triggered fade-in animation with slight upward motion to the AboutUs page sections using the existing useScrollAnimation hook and Intersection Observer pattern. Apply the same cubic-bezier easing function (cubic-bezier(0.4, 0.0, 0.2, 1)) used in other landing page sections for consistent premium transitions.
acceptanceCriteria: Each major section fades in when entering viewport
Fade-in includes slight upward motion animation
Animation uses cubic-bezier(0.4, 0.0, 0.2, 1) easing
Animation is optimized for 60fps mobile performance
Sections animate sequentially as user scrolls down the page

requirements.text: Add SEO meta tags to the AboutUs page including a descriptive page title 'About Us - Evergreen Hub | Digital Learning & Earning Platform' and meta description highlighting the platform's mission to empower students, beginners, job seekers, and housewives with skill-based courses and affiliate marketing opportunities. Include relevant keywords for search engine optimization.

quotes: Target Audience: Students, Beginners, Job seekers, Housewives, Anyone who wants to start online earning

acceptanceCriteria: Page title is set to 'About Us - Evergreen Hub | Digital Learning & Earning Platform' or similar
Meta description is present and describes the platform's mission and target audience
Meta description mentions key terms: digital learning, earning platform, affiliate marketing, online courses
Meta description is between 150-160 characters for optimal SEO
Open Graph and Twitter card meta tags are included for social sharing

requirements.text: Emphasize in the About Us page content that the platform targets students, beginners, job seekers, housewives, and anyone wanting to start online earning. Clearly present the seven service offerings: skill-based online courses, affiliate marketing opportunities, ready-made landing pages, training sessions and webinars, performance tracking dashboard, and community and team support system. Ensure the tone remains motivational yet realistic, avoiding any fake income promises or exaggerated claims like 'guaranteed income'.

quotes: Target Audience: Students, Beginners, Job seekers, Housewives, Anyone who wants to start online earning

About the Platform: Evergreen Hub is a digital learning and earning platform that provides: Skill-based online courses, Affiliate marketing opportunities, Ready-made landing pages, Training sessions and webinars, Performance tracking dashboard, Community and team support system
No fake income promises, No exaggerated claims like "guaranteed income", Honest and transparent

acceptanceCriteria: Content explicitly mentions all target audiences: students, beginners, job seekers, housewives, and aspiring online earners
All seven service offerings are clearly listed in the What We Offer section
Language is motivational but avoids unrealistic promises
No phrases like 'guaranteed income', 'get rich quick', or similar exaggerated claims
Emphasis on transparency, honest expectations, and genuine support

constraints: Do not modify backend/main.mo for this request as it is frontend-only
Do not edit immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Must use existing ThemeContext for theme integration
Must follow existing routing patterns in App.tsx
Must use existing useScrollAnimation hook for animations
Content must be between 500-700 words total
nonGoals: Backend data models or API endpoints for About Us content
CMS or content management system for editing About Us content
Multi-language support for the About Us page
Video or multimedia embeds in the About Us page
User comments or feedback section on the About Us page
